DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: There is a high rate of glucose intolerance among Hong Kong Chinese. The investigators plan to screen Hong Kong Chinese from the community with oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT). The subjects will be referred from GP centers in the community and self-referred with public advertisement on this survey.
DOC.brief_title: A Survey on the Rate of Glucose Intolerance in Hong Kong Chinese
DOC.criteria: Hong Kong Chinese without history of diabetes known diabetic patients
